channel.title: I can't figure out how to improve my range!!!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "I can't figure out how to improve my range!!!"

item.title: Re: I can't figure out how to improve my range!!!
item.content:encoded:
You are correct. Your Range is the absolute limit of how high you can roll.

In addition to zeroshadowragnarok's advice, another possibility is get to 11 Nin and become a Ninjutsu Special Jonin. That adds +2 Nin Range.

However, there is another way that may (or may not depending on exactly how far along you are and what you've already done) be easier. The quest only requires 3 successes. While successes are rare and hard to come by, you can get three nin successes by purchasing the Arena item that gives you a Nin Success, and then getting two successes from your allies. Dueling Jonin (K-Dog and Bruce Sr.) gives you +1 Successes, in addition to the +1 Success K-Dog gives you. Combine that with the Arena Item, you have your free +3 Successes making range totally irrelevant.

item.title: I can't figure out how to improve my range!!!
item.content:encoded: I'm on the Chunin mission "Walk the dog" and it requires 3 ninjutsu successes of 11 or higher. The problem is that my range is 1-10. I've tried equipping Emosuke, Master P and K dog, but even with their total +3 Ninjustu strength and one success, I can't win. I'm guessing it's because 10 is my max even if I had +1000 strength, so how do I improve this maximum?
